original_title: Daryl Hall & John Oates: The Liberty Concert
overview: On July 4th, 1985 in front of 60,000 fans, Hall & Oates performed at an outdoor benefit concert for the restoration of the Statue Of Liberty. The duo performed most of their soul-funk classics such as: "Family Man," "Rich Girl," "Say It Isn't So," "Method of Modern Love," and more.
title: Daryl Hall & John Oates: The Liberty Concert
